jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Mission: 

"The group that owns, improves, and manages Gojek's liquidity & experience across the Mobility Marketplace." 

We are responsible for the pillars of technology, science, and strategy across the supply-and-demand matching of over two billion global orders in 2019. We provide improved efficiency and quality to move Gojek across our cities.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• You'll be a part of the team that is responsible for designing, developing & managing systems  
  • Balance driver supply with customer demand spread across multiple products and geographies
  • Find the right incentives for our supply at the right time
  • Provide right price for each booking to balance demand and supply

• 6 + years of relevant experience.Hands on in either Clojure,Golang or Java
  • Experience extending and implementing core functionality and libraries in data processing platforms (like Flink, Spark/Spark SQL, Storm Bolts, etc.)
  • Strong fundamentals in OOPS concepts
  • Has intermediate experience with Linux OS and is able to troubleshoot issues
  • Worked on production & distributed systems
  • Understands why we need to test code and has implemented tests
  • Is familiar with basic programming principles such as: YAGNI, KISS, DRY, Composition > Inheritance, Open/Closed, SRP
  • Understands and has worked with REST protocol
  • Able to understand/discuss design and performance tradeoffs in complex systems
  • Is able to implement simple data structures and algorithms as code.Has experience with micro services architecture
  • Exhibits ownership in work, including research and understanding of the problem space
  • Strong fundamentals in networking protocols (Understands OSI model)
  • Understands AGILE programming principles & can put it in practice
  • Experience with streaming and event driven architecture
  • Has worked with Real Time Data pipelines
  • Has worked with chef, ansible, kubernetes or docker
  • Is familiar with Test Driven Development
  • Has worked with Functional Programming and understands concepts of the same (Familiarity with Clojure is another bonus)
